summary: Adds a miniature horse farm southwest of Whiterun with 5 horses and a new follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=15]Miniature Horses[/size][/b][/center]

This mod adds a miniature horse farm southwest of Whiterun. It has 5 horses, which are all protected against attacking dragons.  The farm owner will become your follower and is a potential marriage candidate.  There\'s also a fast travel option available.  Just look for \"Petite Pony Ranch\" on your map.

[u]Installation[/u]
Drag and drop .esp file into data folder

[u]Uninstalling[/u]
Delete .esp file from data folder

[u]Known Issues[/u]
I know it does look a little weird getting on and off the horse.  I can\'t really do much to fix that.
author: SqueakyDoggy
